termsOfUseText: By using Agribzar, you agree to comply with our Terms of Use. These terms govern your access to and use of our services, and you must adhere to them while using the platform. Any violation of these terms may result in suspension or termination of your account.
contactUsText: If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us at any time. Our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you with your inquiries.
termsAndConditionsText: The Terms & Conditions outline the legal framework for using Agribzar's services.
